title: Relatively uniformly continuous semigroups on ordered vector spaces
authors: Eduard Emelyanov, Nazife Erkursun-Ozcan, Svetlana Gorokhova
abstract:
We study relatively uniformly continuous operator semigroups on ordered
vector spaces and extend several recent results obtained by M. Kramar Fijavz,
M. Kandic, M. Kaplin, and J. Gluck in the vector lattice setting to ordered
vector spaces with generating cones.
